channel.title: Post a pic of your offences
channel.description:
Ok so umm i want u guys to post a pic of how many offences u have on ur runescape account, to do to go to appeal an offence or ban and take a pic of the offences.
You can also post the evidence
EDIT: heres mine [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/3862/offencesxb4.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Post a pic of your offences
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:17, topic:25524”]im to lazy to open paint so here is my only one showing… i actually have like 6 but meh…

Offence Date Offence Type Appeal Status
17-Aug-2006 Breaking Rule 5 Denied Why? View Evidence

mr_greens: ok?
mr_greens: so i just get 1.5k for no reason?
mr_greens: oh
mr_greens: yeh
mr_greens: i can buy a d2h w\0 selling the rune
mr_greens: its hard to sell rune t…
mr_greens: like every time
mr_greens: i go on forms to sell
mr_greens: there wont be any threads about rune t…
mr_greens: i put mine up and there is 2-3 others selling for cheapers
mr_greens: well i duno the price now
mr_greens: i was going for 1.2
mr_greens: ok
mr_greens: non on forms
mr_greens: none on forms*?
mr_greens: see
mr_greens: im going to put a post up
mr_greens: and watch
mr_greens: there gona be a few more to follow me
mr_greens: i made it
mr_greens: brb
*********: omg go stand somewhere else
mr_greens: no im good here
*********: nub
mr_greens: lol
*********: little kid…
mr_greens: reported
*********: for what ? lal
mr_greens: asking if im a little kid
*********: didnt asked
mr_greens: looked like you asked to me…
mr_greens: your a *******
*********: ill report you for encouraging fine then
mr_greens: ******
mr_greens: …
mr_greens: your like michael jackson
mr_greens: asking for little kids
*********: nah me dun like nikkers
mr_greens: im black reported again
*********: whaha
mr_greens: dough report him
*********: you 2 r really sad
mr_greens: im actually happy
*********: go cry then
*********: what else r names for
mr_greens: dude you called me black and a ni…
*********: rofl
*********: wise guy a suppose
mr_greens: skull
mr_greens: i dont care
*********: dont cry then
mr_greens: your gona get a 7 day bann for calling me a ni…
*********: lmao sure
mr_greens: that cheers me up
*********: acting like a jagex mod to me
mr_greens: lol
mr_greens: he turns my frown upside down =)
mr_greens: * rly
mr_greens: skull skurred?
*********: done
mr_greens: lol he reported me
*********: no really?
mr_greens: may i ask what for?
*********: jagex impersonation
*********: you cant say that other will be banned
mr_greens: looks like staff impersonation to me
mr_greens: your telling me what i cant say
*********: yup
mr_greens: reported
*********: lol ?
mr_greens: you just told me what i cant say.
mr_greens: staff impersonation
*********: you r coming up with new rules?
mr_greens: so are you
*********: not really…
mr_greens: since when cant i say your going to get a 7 day bann
mr_greens: for calling me a ni…
*********: you cant let me get a ban or ban me…
*********: so why should you even talk about ban
mr_greens: you know everything dont you
mr_greens: sounds like a staff member to me
mr_greens: dough
*********: nah
mr_greens: you hear this
mr_greens: jagex staff member!
*********: just trying to be a good person
mr_greens: come talk to jagex staff over here skull king43!
mr_greens: o wait
mr_greens: no gold crown?

[size=14] note i only reported him one time i just wanted to scare him k thx. [/size]

P.S. yeah i know my name is on there but i have nothing to hide because i don’t cheat on runescape i play legit.[/quote]

lolololol! ur tellin me what i cant say… STAFF IMPERSONATION! i say we find mr. greens and beat the shit out of him… 50 USD says hes not even black

Read full topic

item.title: Post a pic of your offences
item.dc:creator: @Andrewsouls Andrewsouls
item.description:
@Andrewsouls wrote:

[quote=“zoss0, post:8, topic:25524”][quote author=Andrewsouls link=topic=38361.msg462807#msg462807 date=1163602097]
I’m on thin ice, 2 black marks gulp
[/quote]
Ouch man! How’d ya do that? I’ve never gotten flagged or makzzzed[/quote]

Well when the old chat system, where the things you type come up straight away was there, i held my function key autochat in world 1… i did it all the time and all you could see was “selling rune b axes *****”
Some nubnub reported me…
The funniest part is that i got a black mark, sighed, and kept doing it… yeah and now i still use autochat, but like slowy and i got 2 black marks for the same offence

Read full topic
